artefact.overview: Register your invention as a patent to protect your intellectual property
artefact.more_information:
The application fee is £230, including search and examination fee. You also need:

- a detailed description of your invention 
- a legal and technical statement explaining how your invention is distinctive from other patented inventions 

A [patent attorney](http://www.cipa.org.uk/ "Chartered Institute of Patent Attorneys"){:rel="external"} can help with complex patent applications.
artefact.introduction: Apply online with the UK Intellectual Property Office, the European Patent Office, or the World Intellectual Property Organisation.

details.description: Includes registering, protecting and applying for designs and patents
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.

artefact.title: How to protect your intellectual property
